translations: 征服；击败；克服；抑制（感情等）

sentences.sentence: And we-we still have to vanquish his shadow, too.
sentences.translation: 而我们，我们也仍必须战胜他的影子。

sentences.sentence: The best way to vanquish your enemies on the Internet?
sentences.translation: 在网上战胜敌人的法宝？

sentences.sentence: So we will weep together to care each other to vanquish our pain.
sentences.translation: 于是我们将一起哭泣彼此关心，消除我们的痛苦。
